H0.text: The forming of reproductive cells takes place where septa are found.

H1.text: Forming of stem cells takes place where septa is found.

H2.text: Forming of brain cells takes place where septa is found.

H3.text: Forming of muscle tissue takes place where septa is found.

A6.text: Intermuscular septa separate the muscles of the arms and legs.

A7.text: Septum pellucidum is a thin structure separating two fluid pockets in the brain.
